Function Documentation

void sg_transform_flip_x ( const sg_bmap_t *  bmap)

Flip the x axis of the bitmap (horizontal mirror)

void sg_transform_flip_xy ( const sg_bmap_t *  bmap)

Flip both axes of the bitmap (horizontal and vertical mirror)

void sg_transform_flip_y ( const sg_bmap_t *  bmap)

Flip the y axis of the bitmap (vertical mirror)

void sg_transform_shift ( const sg_bmap_t *  bmap,
sg_point_t  shift,
const sg_region_t *  region 
)

Shifts a bitmap.

Parameters
bmapA pointer to the bitmap object
shiftThe amount to shift (signed x,y values)
pThe point in bmap to start shifting (top left corner)
dThe dimensions of bmap to shift
